attributes.action: Stop gazumping, make an offer when buying a house legally binding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make house buying easier, once the offer is accepted by the vendor it is a legally binding agreement. This would prevent the following problems:

"Gazumping" when the owner agrees to sell to one person and then pulls out if they get a better offer.

Chains collapsing due to people putting in offers they are not serious about.

The really nasty situation when the vendor at the last minute asks for more money, even if a price has been agreed.

This would make moving house less stressful and less expensive for everyone
